text: Hey Folks, sorry if you get this one a million times. But how do you embed an image in a notebook, or can you embed one for that matter. I was trying `md"""![]("myimage.png")"""` but that did not seem to work. I could not find any references to this in the docs, but there was some mention in the github issues about this not being possible. So I figured I would check the latest.

text: I've just been using `LocalResource(<path to local image>)` or `Resource(<url of hosted image>)` with PlutoUI, but I would definitely be interested to hear if there are more preferred methods! I think there is also more info about this in the PlutoUI sample notebook
